offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Glasgow attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Clemons Barron.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.

offences.offenceTitle: Theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 24/03/2016 at Leeds stole PLAYSTATION 4 to the value of 300.00, belonging to Hull Obrien.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.

offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Aberdeen attempted to steal FLAT SCREEN TV to the value of 750.00, belonging to Howard Ashley.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
